label: New Trends
info: A new trend, punctured by a lower low/high or higher low/high.  The price is also near a weekly trend line and 50 ema.
text: level and ema50 and rev > 1 and rev < 3 and price < 50

label: Double Top
info: Multiple tops/bottoms with key levels and ema 50.  The market structure is worth investigating.

label: RSI Divergence
info: Divergence between price and RSI near a key level and ema50

label: Voulme Analysis
info: Volume Spread Analysis is a future indicator related to the Wyckoff market cycle. 1. Up/down thrust (reversal).

label: Wyckoff Cycle
info: Wyckoff market cycle.  List assets that was in accumulation - distribution phase by the Market Makaers within last 6 weeks..

label: Morning Gapper
info: Big price jump overnight (after market).  Last night only.

label: Gap
info: Big gap in overnight price in last 6 days.
